participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Friendly and adventurous, always eager to try new things.
participant_1.background: I'm looking for a place to live that is close to the Y so I can continue my swimming routine. I'm not sure if I'm a good cook, but my dog seems to like my cooking. I love to snack between meals. I love going to comedy clubs. I'm adjusting to college life and still trying to find my way around.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and humorous, with a passion for storytelling and art.
participant_2.background: I want to inspire people with my webcomic and music. I am funny. I wish I knew where I belonged in the world, but my gummy worm collection is a comfort to me. I loved reading books to my younger siblings, and we would all pretend to be the characters in the story. I love to swim, and began at a young age.

content.text: I'm trying to find a place to live that is close to the Y so I can continue my swimming routine.
I love to swim too! I started at a young age.
I do too! I loved playing water polo when I was in school.
That sounds so fun! I wish I could have played sports.
What do you do for fun?
I love to go to comedy clubs. I think they're the funniest things ever!
I've never been to one before! I'm not sure I would be brave enough to go.
You should try it! It's really fun!
I'll have to give it a try. What else do you do for fun?
I like to write webcomics and music. I'm trying to inspire people with my work.
That's really cool! I've never tried writing a webcomic before.
It's a lot of fun! I like coming up with stories and characters.
I bet it is! I'm not sure if I would be good at it.
You should give it a try! You might surprise yourself.
